Might be worthy mentioning here that there are two advantages of `Later` over `lazy val` 
1. `Later` allows the thunk being GC'd after evaluation and
2. `Later`'s synchronization lock locks itself while lazy vals lock their enclosing class. Discussed in detail [here](https://github.com/scalaz/scalaz/issues/1144)
